thread.title: Excellent, modern centrally located hotel in Rome -
thread.title_full: Excellent, modern centrally located hotel in Rome - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: David W
title: Excellent, modern centrally located hotel in Rome -
text:
Nice room (we had a junior suite). Very friendly and helpful people. Altogether a very pleasant experience. Very well located for attractions and travel, but you can easily walk to most of the most popular tourist attractions. Good roof garden. We wouldn't usually stay in a modern hotel, but Rome Life Hotel was excellent. Highly recommended.
Room Tip: go for at least a junior suite. The rooms are not huge. See more room tips
